Mudhumeni-as-a-Service (MaaS)

Our business model provides affordable, scalable access to smart farming technology through flexible subscription plans.

Starter

Basic IoT kit + mobile monitoring. Ideal for pilot farmers.

Professional

AI-powered greenhouse control, full dashboard analytics, and SMS alerts.

Enterprise

Full MaaS integration with advisory services and advanced analytics.
